Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:24:49
Folder: CWZLGDC - tod's the galleria - event insurance
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CWZLGDC_00
From: Roselle Reyes <Roselle.Reyes@etoilegroup.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Ralph Joudet <Ralph.Joudet@etoilegroup.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-18 17:56
Subject: FW: Tod's The Galleria - event insurance
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Hagop, 

 

Hope you are well. 

 

We would like to seek your advice regarding an event that one of our stores in The Galleria AUH will be hosting on 08th October. We plan to have a gelato cart outside the store from 7 pm to 10 pm. ADGM requires us to have PAR and TPL insurance for the event. Below are the details and illustrations for your reference.

 

We have reached out to Nasco and are currently seeking advice on the types of damages we need to cover for the ice cream and the ice cream cart. Could you kindly guide us on this matter?

 

Insurance – Two mandatory insurance policies required for this event: Third-Party Insurance and All Risk Property Insurance

 

Please note that these names are to be added to the insurance.

metadata.doc_id: CWZLGDC - tod's the galleria - event insurance\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\CWZLGDC - tod's the galleria - event insurance\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
We have reached out to Nasco and are currently seeking advice on the types of damages we need to cover for the ice cream and the ice cream cart. Could you kindly guide us on this matter?

 

Insurance – Two mandatory insurance policies required for this event: Third-Party Insurance and All Risk Property Insurance

 

Please note that these names are to be added to the insurance.

 

	*	Sowwah Square Investment – Sole Proprietorship LLC
	*	AlSowah Square Properties LLC

 

These need to be added in both TPL and PAR please.

 

1.	Third Part Liability : this is mandatory for any event open to the public, as it covers liability towards third parties.

Public liability insurance with cover of no less than AED 1,000,000 for a single event. Cover shall extend to include the Company as co-insureds, a cross liability clause, a primary clause and a subrogation waiver clause in favour of the Company and Mubadala. 

 

2.	Property All Risk: this covers the area where the gelato card will be placed outside the store.

All risks coverage for any property owned, hired or leased by the Service Provider which is brought onto the Company’s premises.  Such insurance shall include a subrogation waiver in favour of the Company and Mubadala and a primary clause.

 



 

Looking forward to hearing from you at your earliest convenience.

 

Best regards,

 

Roselle Reyes
Administration Coordinator II

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/OYLpC4YN0FLRY6OUOfZt4vYCk?domain=etoilegroup.com> 

 

Dir: +971 4 596 9081 T: +971 4 596 9000

Dear Roselle,

 

In reference to the discussion with Avishek, we request you to kindly advise what sort of damages you are looking to cover for the Ice Cream and the ice cream kart.

 

Regarding TPL, we will request Insurer to provide PL COI with required clauses.

Also, please inform the Ice Cream provider to include your enrity Ingie Etoile as Additional Insured under their PL policy with a cross liability clause, Indemnity to Principal and subrogation waiver clause in favour of Ingie Etoile. 

 

Prasad Hiremath 

Senior Relationship Executive - Non-Marine

From: Roselle Reyes 
Sent: Thursday, 18 September, 2025 10:16 AM
To: Prasad Hiremath <Prasad.Hiremath@nascodubai.com <mailto:Prasad.Hiremath@nascodubai.com> >
Cc: Ralph Joudet <Ralph.Joudet@etoilegroup.com <mailto:Ralph.Joudet@etoilegroup.com> >; Avishek Barua <Avishek.Barua@nascodubai.com <mailto:Avishek.Barua@nascodubai.com> >; Manish Chawla <Manish.Chawla@nascodubai.com <mailto:Manish.Chawla@nascodubai.com> >
Subject: RE: Tod's The Galleria - event insurance
Importance: High

 

Hi Prasad,

 

Good morning!

 

Please be informed that I inquired with the mall re: the TPL and they mentioned the same comment: to secure TPL. Below information for reference, kindly proceed accordingly and share the certificates as soon as possible to be shared to mall management to release the necessary mall permits for the event. 

 

Insurance date: 08th October 2025

PAR value: AED20,000 (assets that will be used during the event, outside the store) 

TPL indemnity limit: AED 1,000,000 for a single event

 

Insurance – Two mandatory insurance policies required for this event: Third-Party Insurance and All Risk Property Insurance

 

Please note that these names are to be added to the insurance.

 

	*	Sowwah Square Investment – Sole Proprietorship LLC
	*	AlSowah Square Properties LLC

 

These need to be added in both TPL and PAR please.

 

1.	Third Part Liability : this is mandatory for any event open to the public, as it covers liability towards third parties.

chunks.text:
*	Sowwah Square Investment – Sole Proprietorship LLC
	*	AlSowah Square Properties LLC

 

These need to be added in both TPL and PAR please.

 

1.	Third Part Liability : this is mandatory for any event open to the public, as it covers liability towards third parties.

Public liability insurance with cover of no less than AED 1,000,000 for a single event. Cover shall extend to include the Company as co-insureds, a cross liability clause, a primary clause and a subrogation waiver clause in favour of the Company and Mubadala. 

 

2.	Property All Risk: this covers the area where the gelato card will be placed outside the store.

All risks coverage for any property owned, hired or leased by the Service Provider which is brought onto the Company’s premises.  Such insurance shall include a subrogation waiver in favour of the Company and Mubadala and a primary clause.

 

 

Should you need further information, do let us know. 

 

 

 

Best regards,

 

Roselle Reyes
Administration Coordinator II

Dear Avishek, 

 

Good afternoon!

 

We have an event in Tod’s The Galleria Abu Dhabi which requires PAR and TPL particularly for the event with the below details.  

 

Location: Tod’s The Galleria Unit SU-142A Abu Dhabi UAE

Inclusion date: 01st October 2025

 

Insurance – Two mandatory insurance policies required for this event: Third-Party Insurance and All Risk Property Insurance

chunks.text:
Location: Tod’s The Galleria Unit SU-142A Abu Dhabi UAE

Inclusion date: 01st October 2025

 

Insurance – Two mandatory insurance policies required for this event: Third-Party Insurance and All Risk Property Insurance

 

Location: Level L2 - The Luxury Collection (Tod's Event Location In front of the store)

 

Please note that these names are to be added to the insurance.

 

o    Sowwah Square Investment – Sole Proprietorship LLC

o    AlSowah Square Properties LLC

These need to be added in both TPL and PAR please.

1.      Public Liability Insurance

Public liability insurance with cover of no less than AED 1,000,000 for a single event. Cover shall extend to include the Company as co-insureds, a cross liability clause, a primary clause and a subrogation waiver clause in favour of the Company and Mubadala.

2.      All Risk Insurance

All risks coverage for any property owned, hired or leased by the Service Provider which is brought onto the Company’s premises.  Such insurance shall include a subrogation waiver in favour of the Company and Mubadala and a primary clause.

 

Should you have any query, do let us know. 

 

 

Best regards,

 

Roselle Reyes
Administration Coordinator II

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/OYLpC4YN0FLRY6OUOfZt4vYCk?domain=etoilegroup.com/> 

 

Dir: +971 4 596 9081 T: +971 4 596 9000

A: 31st Floor, Gold Tower, Cluster I, Jumeirah Lakes Towers, P.O. Box 20164, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

	
www.etoilegroup.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/OYLpC4YN0FLRY6OUOfZt4vYCk?domain=etoilegroup.com/>
